person.persName: Thomas Nixon (Clark County, Ohio, paper manufacturer)

body.p: Clark County, Ohio, paper manufacturer. Pennsylvania native. Married to Sarah Nixon. Father of Susannah Nixon, Morris Nixon, Martin Nixon, William Nixon, Francis M. Nixon, Louisa Nixon, James Finley Nixon, and Elizabeth Nixon. Paper maker in Clark County, Ohio in 1850. Paper manufacturer in Clark County in 1860. Partner in the firm of Nixon, Chatfield & Woods from June 13, 1860 to June 7, 1865. Employed Sarah McCarty as a domestic laborer in Clark County in 1860. Employed Benjamin Coon as a cart driver in Clark County in 1860.
